procedure.title: WF-EX-001 baseline: repo_change_plan workflow (human+Codex)
procedure.description: Baseline workflow for planning and applying repository changes: operator defines task, Codex generates change plan, applies edits, runs tests, and captures snapshot.

steps.name: Define task in operator chat
steps.description: Human operator writes a clear task/goal to be solved in the current repository.

steps.name: Generate repo change plan via skill.repo_code_change_plan_basic
steps.description: Codex agent generates env+run for repo change plan, with constraints (no core/mova changes) and target lab areas.

steps.name: Apply code and data changes according to plan
steps.description: Codex agent edits repository files following the plan steps, staying in lab green layer.

steps.name: Run npm test / validators
steps.description: Execute npm test to validate schemas, manifests, and bindings.

steps.name: Take repo snapshot via skill.repo_snapshot_basic
steps.description: Capture repository snapshot to record state after changes.

steps.name: Operator review and sign-off
steps.description: Human operator reviews changes, test results, and snapshot before merge.
